meanings.sent1: The noncrushable toy car remained intact even after being stepped on.
meanings.sent2: The noncrushable packaging protected the fragile items inside during shipping.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's noncrushable shield deflected all attacks from the villains.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was as noncrushable as a diamond, resilient in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The noncrushable armor of the knight was legendary, withstanding every blow in battle.

meanings.definition: Unable to be flattened or destroyed.
meanings.sent1: The noncrushable aluminum can was perfect for storing fizzy drinks.
meanings.sent2: The noncrushable mattress retained its shape and comfort for years.
meanings.sent3: The noncrushable balloon surprised everyone by not popping despite being squeezed tightly.
meanings.sent4: His noncrushable determination to succeed drove him to overcome all obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The noncrushable spirit of the team lifted them to victory against all odds.
